original_text: We proclaim to you what we have seen and heard, so that you also may have fellowship with us. And our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son, Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 우리가 보고 들은 바를 너희에게도 전함은 너희로 우리와 사귐이 있게 하려 함이니 우리의 사귐은 아버지와 그의 아들 예수 그리스도와 더불어 누림이라

sentences.original_text: what we have seen and heard
so that you also may have fellowship with us
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 우리와 교제를 가질 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: And our fellowship is with the Father
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리의 교제는 아버지와 함께 있으니

sentences.original_text: and with his Son, Jesus Christ
